briefdescription.para: Enable or disable clock of LCD module.

parameterdescription.para: When one enable the clock of LCD module, when zero disable

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable the LCD module.

parameterdescription.para: When one enable the LCD module, when zero disable

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable the LCD module.

parameterdescription.para: When one close LCD module, when zero open the LCD module

detaileddescription.para: Static (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0])
1/2 Duty cycle (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0:1])
1/3 Duty cycle (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0:2])
1/4 Duty cycle (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0:3])
1/5 Duty cycle (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0:4])
1/6 Duty cycle (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0:5])
1/7 Duty cycle (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0:6])
1/8 Duty cycle (segments can be multiplexed with LCD_COM[0:7])

parameterdescription.para: LCD reference refresh frequency in Hz that will be used

briefdescription.para: Turn on or clear a segment.

parameterdescription.para: Bit index of which field to change
When one will set segment, when zero will clear segment

simplesect.para: before this function be called, the module must have been intialized

briefdescription.para: select the voltage of LCD module

parameterdescription.para:
This parameter can be one of the following values:
VLCD27
VLCD28
VLCD29
VLCD30
VLCD31
VLCD32
VLCD33

briefdescription.para: set the duty of LCD module

parameterdescription.para:
This parameter can be one of the following values:
DUTY_STATIC
DUTY_ONEHALF
DUTY_ONETHIRD
DUTY_ONEFOURTH
DUTY_ONEFIFTH
DUTY_ONESIXTH
DUTY_ONESEVENTH
DUTY_ONEEIGHTH

briefdescription.para: set the bias of LCD module

parameterdescription.para:
This parameter can be one of the following values:
BIAS_STATIC
BIAS_ONEHALF
BIAS_ONETHIRD
BIAS_ONEFOURTH

briefdescription.para: config the vdd mode of LCD module

parameterdescription.para:
This parameter can be one of the following values:
X_VDD
I_VDD

briefdescription.para: enable or disable the LCD module gpio

parameterdescription.para: config value per bit for one LCD gpio, set enable gpio output ,clear disabled
